snippet: Turkey and the United States signed an agreement to train and equip moderate Syrian rebels to fight militants from the Islamic State, Foreign Minister Mevlut Cavusoglu said, according to the Anadolu News Agency.
abstract: Turkey and United States sign pact to train and equip moderate Syrian rebels to fight Islamic State extremists.
lead_paragraph: Turkey and the United States signed an agreement to train and equip moderate Syrian rebels to fight militants from the Islamic State, Foreign Minister Mevlut Cavusoglu said, according to the Anadolu News Agency.

headline.main: Turkey: Deal Set to Aid Syrian Rebels

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
